Articles.Content:
Nooooo way, pal. I usually end up restarting before a year passes. Except the time I did a Dunar landing.

The user below me has never made a Dunar landing.

False.

The yser below me has performed an Ikean landing.

I need to learn to .... before extraplan transfers

user below me can dock

- - - Updated - - -

*dock sorry

As a matter of fact, I can.

The user below me flew a spaceplane to Laythe, landed a base and returned (With a single craft)

Nope. That's Overfloater's job.

The user below me has made a modular station with a mk3 shuttle and returned it with a mk3 shuttle.

Nope. I use B9's S2 and S2 Wide body.

The user below me has seen star wars (any movie).

I've seen star wars but thinking back, it isn't really my thing.

The user below me loves dinosaurs.

False. I'm the sci-fi kind of a person.

The user below me rages when somebody fails to employ elemental logic.

True.

The user below me isn't being sarcastic.

Of course i am sarcastic

The user below me knows whether schrodinger's cat is dead or alive.

I shook the box...

The person below me has a toaster and knows how to use it.

True, but not the one with 2 slots, instead it's the one that squishes a sandwich (or 2) and toasts it.

The user below me has this habit of dressing up before going outside.

Edited January 25, 2015 by Overfloater
for the record, I do know how to use the 2 slot toaster as well!

Um... No.

The user below me lives and breathes planes in ksp.

No. I prefer living a life and breathing air. But planes are a good alternative.

The user below me dislikes MLP.

No. I adore it.

The user below me doesn't discriminate against a user if they like ponies.

0.5/1 sometimes I do, sometimes I don't...

The person below me does take a side to General Rarity's statement.

Nope. Ponies aren't my thing but it doesn't bother me that others love them.

The user below me has ridden a real horse.

Yea.

The user below me has went to eve and returned in ksp.

not in a million years.

The user below me has been drunk.

nope, never had a drop

The used below me has seen the vine of the falcon 9 "landing hard" on a boat

Yes! It was brilliant!

The user below me watches Doctor Who.

nope,

The person below me likes tank battle games.

Yes! Especially if airplanes can fight with the tanks.

The user below me likes MLP.

Guilty as charged

The user below me has a chocolate addiction

Nope.

The user below me hates weebs. And thinks I'm being hypocritical.

Edited January 28, 2015 by mrrpamplemousse
